name: Plan O - Organic Endurance Athlete Muscle Builder

Pre-Morning Workout.details: Organic Energy Gel: 1 organic banana, 1 tbsp organic honey, 1 tbsp organic chia seeds
Pre-Morning Workout.instructions: Blend banana and honey. Stir in chia seeds.

Post-Morning Workout Breakfast.details: Organic Protein Oatmeal: 1 cup organic rolled oats, 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder, 1 organic apple (diced), 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 tbsp organic honey, 1 cup organic almond milk
Post-Morning Workout Breakfast.instructions: Cook oats with almond milk. Stir in protein powder, apple, almond butter, and honey.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Trail Mix: 1/4 cup organic almonds, 1/4 cup organic cashews, 1/4 cup organic dried cranberries, 1/4 cup organic pumpkin seeds

Lunch.details: Organic Quinoa Power Bowl: 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 4 oz organic grilled chicken breast, 1/2 organic avocado, 1/2 cup organic black beans, 1/4 cup organic corn, 2 tbsp organic salsa
Lunch.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Top with salsa.

Afternoon Snack.details: Organic Greek Yogurt Parfait: 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/4 cup organic granola, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries, 1 tbsp organic honey
Afternoon Snack.instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries. Drizzle with honey.

Pre-Evening Workout.details: Organic Rice Cakes with Nut Butter: 2 organic brown rice cakes, 2 tbsp organic peanut butter, 1 organic banana (sliced)
Pre-Evening Workout.instructions: Spread peanut butter on rice cakes. Top with banana slices.

Post-Evening Workout Dinner.details: Organic Salmon with Sweet Potato and Broccoli: 6 oz organic grilled salmon, 1 medium organic sweet potato, 1 cup organic steamed broccoli, 1 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 lemon
Post-Evening Workout Dinner.instructions: Grill salmon. Bake sweet potato. Steam broccoli. Drizzle everything with olive oil and lemon juice.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Protein Shake: 1.5 scoops organic whey protein powder, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1/2 organic banana, 1 tbsp organic almond butter
